action.content:
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:
ANSWER: your answer
action.label: context

action.content:
DESCRIPTION: The image shows a public restroom with several black stall doors. The floor is white with black dots, and there are fluorescent lights on the ceiling. A trash can is visible on the right side.

ANSWER: The restroom has several black stall doors, a white floor with black dots, fluorescent lighting, and a trash can on the right side.
action.label: response

action.content:

Here is the description of what the Escape Room looks like:  description: the image shows a public restroom with several black stall doors. the floor is white with black dots, and there are fluorescent lights on the ceiling. a trash can is visible on the right side.

answer: the restroom has several black stall doors, a white floor with black dots, fluorescent lighting, and a trash can on the right side
